content: This is the public privacy notice for
. This notice describes what data the website collects, why it is collected, and what is done with it.
This privacy notice was last updated
If we change this privacy policy in the future, we will post the new version at

with a new "last updated" date. If the changes are significant, we will give more prominent notice, such as by sending users e-mail or showing an alert on the website. You can review old versions of this privacy notice at

content.heading: Information the Website Collects

content: The website collects the following kinds of personally identifiable information:

inputs.label: Company Name
inputs.comment: The name of the company that operates the website.
hints: Use the legal name of the company. That names probably ends with "LLC", "Inc.", or another word indicating what kind of legal entity it is.

inputs.label: Website URL
hints: If your website has its own domain name, like www.yourwebsite.com, use URL for its homepage, like http://www.yourwebsite.com.

inputs.label: Notice URL
inputs.comment: The URL where the privacy notice will be posted.

inputs.label: Notice History URL
inputs.comment: The URL where users can view old versios of the privacy notice.

inputs.label: Privacy Notice Date
inputs.comment: The date of the last update to the privacy notice.

inputs.label: Collect Names?
inputs.comment: Does the website collect the first or last names of users?

inputs.label: Collect Physical Addresses?
inputs.comment: Does the website collect home or other physical addresses, with street name and city or town name?

inputs.label: Collect E-Mail Addresses?
inputs.comment: Does the website collect e-mail addresses?

inputs.label: Collect Telephone Numbers?
inputs.comment: Does the website collect telephone numbers?

inputs.label: Collect Social Security Numbers?
inputs.comment: Does the website collect social security numbers?

inputs.label: Collect Other Identifiers?
inputs.comment: Does the website collect other information that could be used to contact specific individuals online or offline?

inputs.label: Collect Combined Information?
inputs.comment: Does the website collect other information about users that is stored with or combined with other personal information about them?
